Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near Vincennes/87th
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Vincennes/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Vincennes/87th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
